EcmaScript6 Examples - definition classes

EcmaScript 6 brings the object orientation paradigm to make the developers' life easier. Probably the majority of developers who have contact with other languages as Ruby, C#, Java, and etc are accostumed with object orientation, and because of that work with classes and objects in EcmaScript 6 will make their life much better.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    var MachineES5 = function(){};

In EcmaScript 5 a class was a function without body. 

                
                    class MachineES6{
                    }

In EcmaScript6 exists the class keyword that to make the language easier to work with object orientation paradigm. Behind the scene the EcmaScript 6 still working with a function doing the same code of EcmaScript 5.
